shortDescription: Directory traversal vulnerability in editor.php in Network Weathermap 0.97c and earlier allows remote attackers to read arbitrary files via a .. (dot dot) in the mapname parameter in a show_config action.
vulnerabilityName: network-weathermap .network_weathermap Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal')
required_action: Apply remediations or mitigations per vendor instructions or discontinue use of the product if remediation or mitigations are unavailable.
